channel.title: How do you make an npc both talk and trade[DELTA] PLEASE HELPPP
channel.description: hey guys so i need it to be like this if you left click the npc or right click and click talk to it will tell you your assault kills and if you right click it and click trade it will open up the assault shop i have tried adding it but one is always overwriting the other like if the statement that tells it to open up the shop comes after the one that makes it tell you your points the shop statement overwrites the talk one anyone help me with that please :)

item.title: How do you make an npc both talk and trade[DELTA] PLEASE HELPPP
item.dc:creator: @own_master own master
item.description:
@own_master wrote:

hey guys so i need it to be like this if you left click the npc or right click and click talk to it will tell you your assault kills
and if you right click it and click trade it will open up the assault shop i have tried adding it but one is always overwriting the other like if the statement that tells it to open up the shop comes after the one that makes it tell you your points the shop statement overwrites the talk one anyone help me with that please
